Gangon's spark, without warning, broke free and zipped away. It zipped by
Deemos' face and he grabbed it.

"Inzola, since your okay, care to assist me? This spark is all alone, I'm
going to make it a body!" Deemos said evilly. Inzola nodded and smiled.
hours later, Deemos and Inzola finished and Gangon woke up. He seen Deemos
and Inzola and his heart sped up. He grabbed his chest in pain and ran.
Deemos and Inzola laughed to each other.

"Now we can moniter him and control him!" Deemos said

"Wasn't that the one we beat up before?" Inzola asked. Deemos shrugged and
they both laughed while evil music played. Gangon stumbled around until he
was in the room with BrightBlade, ironically. (Just trying to speed things
up) Deemos pushed a button on the remote control, it was sleep. Gangon seen
BrightBlade and gasped. He smiled really big and then fell to sleep. He hit
the floor with a loud thud, still smiling in his sleep...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, August 14, 2000 7:47 PM
Subject: What's Happening?!



* BrightBlades plan was working perfectly, already she could sense the
tension in the Maximal begin to ease off. But of course, they weren't about
to let HER know that.
Her shivers were getting worse and now, if anybot touched her, they would
feel her cold under their grasp.
She kept her eyes glued on Smokescreen, her arm reaching to him and pleading
in her optics.
What gullible fools these Maximals were, how easy it was to tamper with
their emotions and minds.
BrightBlade suddenly flinched, a pain washed over her but it wasn't from her
wounds.it was from her HEAD! She couldn't figure it out; she hadn't hit her
head or anything. Why should anything happen?
She put a hand on her temple and closed her eyes, swaying a bit from the
sudden rush of nausea that passed over her.
Something was happening to her, something very strange.
BrightBlade didn't notice that Rex still had his weapon trained on her, and
she didn't notice that she had taken Smokescreens hand and had slowly rose
to her feet.
But she leaned against the wall with a shocked look on her face, not really
knowing just what was happening.
All of a sudden she thought that she was a real Maximal when she had been a
Predacon all her life, and she suddenly had the notion that the Maximal
Grimmler loved her.
She almost found herself looking towards him with a slight bit of longing,
wanting and wishing that he really did love her.
But then she shook her head and took in a beep breath, letting it out
slowly.
She had to remember that she was a Predacon and not a Maximal, and that
Grimmler could never love her.
But even as she thought this she felt the thoughts planted into her mind
flare, becoming stronger then they had been before.
BrightBlade leaned against the wall and let go of Smokescreens hand, finally
looking over towards Grimmler as he splashed water into his face.
He was rather handsome; she shook her head again.
What was she thinking?! Was she going insane?!
But even as she looked away from him the feelings began to grow, becoming
even stronger then they had been before.*
